name: Twitter
help: Twitter is an American online news and social networking service on which users post and interact with messages known as 'tweets'

properties.name: ConsumerApiKey
properties.help: The Consumer Api Key needed to access the Twitter API. To get this key, an App with read and write permissions must be created using the Twitter Developer Page

properties.name: ConsumerApiKeySecret
properties.help: The Consumer Api Key Secret needed to access the Twitter API. See ConsumerApiKey on how to get it.

properties.name: AccessToken
properties.help: The Access Token needed to access the Twitter API. See ConsumerApiKey on how to get it.

properties.name: AccessTokenSecret
properties.help: The Access Token Secret needed to access the Twitter API. See ConsumerApiKey on how to get it.
